movie.title: Picture Perfect Mysteries Picture Perfect Mysteries: Dead Over Diamonds
movie.title_english: Picture Perfect Mysteries Picture Perfect Mysteries: Dead Over Diamonds
movie.title_long: Picture Perfect Mysteries Picture Perfect Mysteries: Dead Over Diamonds (2020)
movie.description_intro: Photographer Allie and Detective Sam's investigation into a priceless stolen necklace leads to danger and an unexpected death.
movie.description_full: Photographer Allie and Detective Sam's investigation into a priceless stolen necklace leads to danger and an unexpected death.

movies.title: Peter Pan
movies.summary: An adaptation of J. M. Barrie's story about a boy who never grew up. The three children of the Darling family receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Land, where an ongoing war between Peter's gang of rag-tag runaways and the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.
movies.description_full: An adaptation of J. M. Barrie's story about a boy who never grew up. The three children of the Darling family receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Land, where an ongoing war between Peter's gang of rag-tag runaways and the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

movies.title: The Hero of Color City
movies.summary: A colorful and diverse band of crayons strive to protect their magical, multi-hued homeland from an evil tyrant that threatens to rid their world of joy and color.
movies.description_full: A colorful and diverse band of crayons strive to protect their magical, multi-hued homeland from an evil tyrant that threatens to rid their world of joy and color.
movies.synopsis: A colorful and diverse band of crayons strive to protect their magical, multi-hued homeland from an evil tyrant that threatens to rid their world of joy and color.

movies.title: The Glenn Miller Story
movies.summary: The unemployed trombone player Glenn Miller is always broken, chasing his sound to form his band and hocking his instrument in the pawn house to survive. When his friend Chummy MacGregor is hired to play in the band of Ben Pollack, the band-leader listens to one Glenn's composition and invites him to join his band. While traveling to New York, Glenn visits his former girlfriend Helen Berger, in Boulder, Colorado, and asks her to wait for him. Two years later he quits the band and proposes Helen that moves to New York to marry him. After the success of "Moonlight Serenade", Glenn Miller's band becomes worldwide known and Glenn and Helen and their two children have a very comfortable life. Duting the World War II, Glenn enlists in the army and travels to Europe to increase the moral of the allied troops. In the Christmas of 1944, he travels from London to Paris for a concert to be broadcast; however his plane is never found in the tragic flight.

movies.title: Bodies
movies.summary: Two brothers posing as paramedics kidnap their victims and harvest their organs for the black market. That is until they kidnap a woman they find impossible to kill and it turns out she has more power over them than they over her.
